named-query.name: get.free.tables
named-query.query: SELECT t FROM Table t WHERE t.state = io.oasp.gastronomy.restaurant.tablemanagement.common.api.datatype.TableState.FREE

named-query.name: get.staff.member.by.login
named-query.query: SELECT s FROM StaffMember s WHERE login = ?

named-query.name: get.open.order.positions.for.order
named-query.query: SELECT op FROM OrderPosition op where op.order.id = ? AND op.state NOT IN (io.oasp.gastronomy.restaurant.salesmanagement.common.api.datatype.OrderPositionState.PAYED, io.oasp.gastronomy.restaurant.salesmanagement.common.api.datatype.OrderPositionState.CANCELLED)

named-query.name: get.all.open.order.positions
named-query.query: SELECT op FROM OrderPosition op where op.state NOT IN (io.oasp.gastronomy.restaurant.salesmanagement.common.api.datatype.OrderPositionState.PAYED, io.oasp.gastronomy.restaurant.salesmanagement.common.api.datatype.OrderPositionState.CANCELLED)

named-query.name: get.open.order.for.table
named-query.query: SELECT o FROM Order o WHERE o.state = io.oasp.gastronomy.restaurant.salesmanagement.common.api.datatype.OrderState.OPEN and o.tableId=?
